property.name: title
property.value: Need More Help? Contact Nana Owusu-Nkwantabisa

string_table.name: npnxnanbnsnfns10111101101
string_table.string: Closed captions. Press the spacebar to toggle captions on and off.
Skip Navigation. Hit enter to return to the slide.

resource_data.description: Here are some useful links and documents:

slidetranscripts.slidetranscript: <Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Span Text="What type of copyright-protected media would you like to use? Click the button for each to see answers to some common questions about that media. You may also click the Permission button to see a template for requesting permission from a copyright holder." /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Span Text="Here are some common questions related to using audio in your courses, click each to see the answer to these common questions or click one of the buttons at the bottom of the screen to view information on that type of media." /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Span Text="Here are some common questions related to using video in your courses, click each to see the answer to these common questions or click one of the buttons at the bottom of the screen to view information on that type of media." /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Span Text="Here are some common questions related to using text in your courses, click each to see the answer to these common questions or click one of the buttons at the bottom of the screen to view information on that type of media." /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Span Text="Here are some common questions related to using images in your courses, click each to see the answer to these common questions or click one of the buttons at the bottom of the screen to view information on that type of media." /> </Block> </Content> </Document>
